description: With Holidays Trip, you can save all your trips and combine them with photos and notes. Each photo and note will be geo-located thanks to GPS. At the end of each trip, you get all the details of your journey (departure, arrival, followed routes, photos, notes...) and all your photos organized on each trip. You just have to display the map and click on the image you want to see.  Holidays Trip was developed for the SFR Developer Challenge organized by SFR and Palm.  Please contact us for any questions or suggestions. Follow us on http://twitter.com/holidaystrip
